prompt:
Describe a scenario in which you had to communicate complex information to someone who did not have technical expertise and how your writing skills helped you do so effectively.
Recently, I found myself needing to explain the intricacies of search engine optimization (SEO) to an old friend who runs her own small business but lacks any real tech knowledge or experience. She wanted help optimizing her website so it would appear higher in search results and therefore attract more customers. Given our differences in understanding these technical concepts, I had to explain them simply yet clearly while also keeping my explanation relevant to her needs as a business owner.
